newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Bank Indonesia supplies 493 bln rph temporarily.
newsitem.headline: Bank Indonesia supplies 493 bln rph temporarily.

text.p: Indonesia's central bank, Bank Indonesia, supplied some 493 billion rupiah temporarily on the money market early on Tuesday, money traders said.
Some 513 billion rupiah of central bank certificates (SBIs) were due today, compared with 20 billion rupiah of SBIs to be settled today.
